dialog.delete-model: Are you sure you want to delete this model?

auth-form.name: Full Name
auth-form.signUpToGetStarted: Just a few steps to get you set up
auth-form.signIn-description: Every workout can be logged offline, so nothing slows you down. Sign in to save your progress, share routines, and pick up where you left off on any device. Your exercises, sets, and personal records are always within reach.

calendar.no-workout-description: No workout. Start a new workout.

summary-widget.footer: Progress is based on your weekly goal.

templates-widget.footer: You don't have any saved templates yet.

workout-view.select-exercises: To get started, select some exercises.

workout-board.exit-workout-message: You're about to cancel your workout. You can also save it as a template before exiting.
workout-board.discard-template-message: You're about to remove your template changes.
workout-board.confirm-template-message: Would you like to finish editing? You can always come back later and make changes to the template.
workout-board.complete-workout-message: Are you sure you want to complete this workout? You won't be able to make changes to it later.
workout-board.delete-exercises-message: Are you sure you want to delete these exercises? This action cannot be undone.
workout-board.delete-exercise-message: Are you sure you want to delete this exercise? This action cannot be undone.
workout-board.prefix-description: Use this field to mark or customize exercises for this session. It won't change the original exercise name.
workout-board.create-exercise-copy: Create a New Exercise Using This One...
workout-board.create-exercise-copy-description: Creating a new exercise will use this one as a base. You can edit the name, sets, and other details on the next screen. This helps you quickly add personalized variations without starting from scratch. The changes will only affect the new exercise, keeping your original one intact.
workout-board.rest-timer-description: Adjust the rest duration between sets. After you finish a set, the timer will start automatically using this value. You can tweak it in 15-second steps to match how much recovery you need.
workout-board.add-session-notes-placeholder: Add session notes, goals, or thoughts... (optional)
workout-board.notes-description: Your notes are saved automatically. Use the template view to quickly fill structured fields, or switch to plain text for freeform thoughts - either way, everything stays synced to this session.
workout-board.notes-template-view: Use the template view to quickly fill structured fields, or switch to plain text for freeform thoughts - either way, everything stays synced to this session.
workout-board.session-name-description: Give your session a name that captures its focus or vibe - something you'll recognize later, or just keep it in date format.

template-view.add-tags: Add tags that describe your template.

template-board.template-description-placeholder: Add template notes, goals, or toughts... (optional)

recap.copied-to-clipboard: Session recap copied to clipboard with legend.

sessions.options-info: Manage your workout session - view its recap, copy the layout as text, turn it into a reusable template, or remove it if you don't need it anymore.
sessions.add-template-info: Save this session's layout as a new template. Giving it a clear name helps you recognize it later or use it for similar workouts.
sessions.update-template-info: Update the template used for this session. You can adjust its layout, rename it, and keep it aligned with your latest workout changes.
sessions.remove-info: Removing this session can't be undone. Your progress stats will be affected.
sessions.active-session-warning: Active workout in progress. Finish it or cancel it before starting a new session.

templates.empty-info: Templates are pre-made sets of exercises you can reuse whenever you want. Tap the plus button above to start your first one. Creating a template is quick and editable, letting you organize your workouts efficiently. Once you have a few, you can mix and match them to plan your training week, saving time and keeping your focus on lifting rather than planning each set from scratch.
templates.options-info: Customize your workout template - rename it, adjust details, start a session from it, make a copy for variations, or delete it if it's no longer needed.
templates.clone-info: Duplicate this template to create a new version while keeping the original intact. Changing the name can help you distinguish between them.
templates.delete-info: Deleting this template can't be undone. Your previous workouts won't be affected.
templates.active-session-warning: Active workout in progress. Finish it or cancel it before starting a new session or editing templates.
templates.no-templates-found-match: No templates found matching your search

splits.title: Splits
splits.delete-message: This will remove the split (the way your templates are grouped). Don't worry - your workouts and templates will stay safe.
splits.footer-info: Edit your split here - adjust its name, change training or rest days, add or reorder workouts, and update notes. These changes affect all future workouts and sessions for this split. One split can be active at a time; if you deactivate it, the default “No Split” plan will apply automatically.
splits.list-info: Manage your split plans here - organize and store all your training routines so you can switch between them easily. Each split represents a different plan or focus for your workouts, letting you vary your training while keeping everything tracked. One split is always active; if none is selected, the default “No Split” will be used automatically.
splits.set-your-fitness-goals-description: Set how many workouts you want per week. You can also adjust this and other goals in Settings → Goals.
splits.active-split-alert: Active split detected - weekly goal can't be changed directly.
splits.create-template-info: Create a template to quickly add your favorite workouts to this split. You can customize it to fit your routine and save time when planning future workouts. Additionally, you can create a template directly from any completed session, making it easy to reuse workouts you've already done.
splits.create-template-description: Create a template to quickly add your favorite workouts to this split. You can customize it to fit your routine and save time when planning future workouts. Additionally, you can create a template directly from any completed session, making it easy to reuse workouts you've already done.
splits.add-workout-from-sessions-list-title: Add workout from completed sessions in the last 7 days.
splits.go-to-summary: Go to Summary to create templates
splits.create-split-using-this-description: Looks like you haven't stitched a split together yet. Build one to keep your training structured and easier to follow.

all.workouts-this-week-description: View your completed workouts from the this week.

alert.end-workout-message: You're about to end your workout. You can finish it and save it or save it as template isntead.
